name: Hell Level Challenge
description:
A super-hard platformer in a hellish style, the main goal of which is to learn how to dodge all the deadly obstacles and get to the only exit - the portal.

Accept the challenge and check what you are capable of!

Game Features:
• Intentionally high difficulty
• Hardcore achievements for the most skilled players
• Despite the features above - precise controls
• Keyboard, gamepad and touchscreen supported
